topic.title: MAW GWT: Run Flow and Transport Models

para.text: MAW GWT: Run Flow and Transport Models

Now run MODFLOW again. The flow and transport models will run in the different simulations in this case and ModelMonitor will be run twice: one for each simulation. Budgets for both the flow and transport models will be displayed in ModelMonitor and the listing files for the flow model, the transport model, and the simulations will open in a text editor. None of those should display any warning or error messages. If they do, check that you have entered the data correctly.
